full_summary:
***Gooseneck Recovery Trailer Tender Notice***

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of **One (1) Gooseneck Recovery Trailer** with an optional quantity of **Three (3)**, for a period of up to **Twelve (12) months**.

**Key Details:**

* ***Citation Reference:*** cb-565-24577747
* ***Solicitation Number:*** W6399-24-LQ28/A
* ***Notice Publication Date:*** 2024-05-08
* ***Tender Closing Date:*** 2024-07-02 14:00:00 (Expired)

**Solicitation Details:**

* ***Procurement Category:*** Goods and Services
* ***Trade Agreements:*** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* ***Region(s) of Opportunity:*** Canada
* ***Region(s) of Delivery:*** National Capital Region (NCR), Petawawa

**RFP Documents:**

Available for download on the Canada Buys website:

* Original RFP (EN)
* Amendment 01 (EN)
* Amendment 02 (EN)
* Amendment 03 (EN)
* Original RFP (FR)
* Amendment 01 (FR)
* Amendment 02 (FR)
* Amendment 03 (FR)

**Contact Information:**

* Matthew Yaraskovitch
* matthew.yaraskovitch@forces.gc.ca
* (613) 945-2762

**Note:**

All bids must be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. The equipment must fully comply with the Technical Specifications within the RFP solicitation document.

**Contract Award:**

The expected contract award date is not specified. DND reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers and may award the contract to the most responsive and responsible supplier based on the evaluation criteria outlined in the RFP solicitation document. I
